backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining bet, booking, and result types, storing lists of bets/bookings, predefined histories, and providing submit and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping required UI features to corresponding frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, dark mode theme, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, theme provider, layout, and page components.
Animated banner showing three info lines that fade in sequentially over a background image.
frontend/src/components/home/LiveResultC: Reusable live result card with blinking indicator, number circles, and a Play Now button.
frontend/src/components/home/VipWinnersT: Auto-scrolling vertical ticker displaying duplicated VIP winners list with flag and masked info.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout wrapping all pages with spacing and fixed bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Fixed bottom nav bar with Home, Deposit, and Withdraw buttons and active path highlighting.
frontend/src/components/results/ResultRo: Single result row showing date, game name, time, and winning number with gold-accent styling.
frontend/src/constants/homeContent.ts: Static game rate data and a generated list of 25 VIP winners with masked names and phones.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode tokens, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DepositPage.tsx: Implements a deposit form with preset amounts, validation, and simulated processing feedback.
frontend/src/pages/GamePlayPage.tsx: Allows users to place bets by entering numbers and amounts, then submits them to the backend actor.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main home screen with hero banner, quick results, game rates, and navigation to play pages.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays lottery result history based on selected type using backend actor methods.
frontend/src/pages/TicketBookingPage.tsx: Ticket booking form that submits user info and selected ticket type to an actor, with validation, toasts, and navigation after success.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Withdrawal form with preset amounts, balance validation, simulated processing, and success navigation feedback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project state, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and required app features for a lottery platform.
